name: St Patricks Hat
description:
## St Patricks Hat

Top o' the mornin' to ya, me friend! A special event item found at Bumpkin parties during the festive season

### Bumpkins.io

Deposit this wearable in Sunflower Land to equip it on your Bumpkin

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
